dr.evolution.coalescent
Class ScaledDemographic

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.coalescent.DemographicFunction.Abstract
      dr.evolution.coalescent.ScaledDemographic
All Implemented Interfaces:
DemographicFunction, Units, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.commons.math.analysis.UnivariateRealFunction
public class ScaledDemographic
extends DemographicFunction.Abstract

Scale a demographic by a fixed factor. Minimal implementation, only value and intensity implemented.

Author:
Joseph Heled Date: 19/11/2007
See Also:
Serialized Form
